title: Trailer Hitch Install: CURT 15318 on Dodge Ram
description:
This video depicts the installation of the CURT 15318 Xtra Duty trailer hitch on a 1995 Dodge Ram.

Install Sheet - 
https://www.curtmfg.com/masterlibrary/15318/installsheet/CM_15318_INS.PDF

Application Coverage:
1994 - 2002 Dodge Ram 2500,3500; 8' bed only

Special Notes:
***DO NOT EXCEED VEHICLE MANUFACTURER'S RECOMMENDED TOWING CAPACITY***
PERIODICALLY CHECK THIS RECEIVER HITCH TO ENSURE THAT ALL FASTENERS
ARE TIGHT AND THAT ALL STRUCTURAL COMPONENTS ARE SOUND.

Warning:
-This video is intended to be used as reference. Please refer to print instructions for complete installation information.
tags: CURT Receiver Hitch, trailer hitches, towing, how to install, Dodge Ram, curt 15318
